articles.description: Thomas Frank's move to Spurs is a risk for the charismatic Dane - but he has earned the big opportunity, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Thomas Frank to Spurs: Move from Brentford to Tottenham is risky but Danish manager earned chance

articles.description: Rory McIlroy is among many to find  Oakmont Country Club a bruising challenge as JJ Spaun sets the early pace on day one at the US Open.
articles.title: US Open 2025: Rory McIlroy falters as JJ Spaun leads at tough Oakmont course

articles.description: South Africa's players have the "belief" they can pull off a sensational victory in the World Test Championship final, according to batter David Bedingham.
articles.title: World Test Championship: South Africa have 'belief' to pull off 'amazing' win at Lord's

articles.description: Brazil forward Matheus Cunha says he "dreamed of wearing the red shirt" when he was a child.
articles.title: Man Utd: Matheus Cunha signs for £63m from Wolves

articles.description: Australian Olympian Heath Ryan has been suspended by Equestrian Australia after a video emerged of him 'repeatedly whipping' a horse
articles.title: Heath Ryan suspended for whipping a horse

articles.description: Kevin de Bruyne completes his move to Napoli after leaving Manchester City at the end of the 2024-25 Premier League season.
articles.title: Kevin de Bruyne: Napoli sign former Manchester City midfielder

articles.description: George Russell says he was "surprised" that Max Verstappen took accountability for colliding with the Mercedes driver during the Spanish Grand Prix.
articles.title: George Russell says it was 'good' that Max Verstappen took accountability for Spanish Grand Prix collision

articles.description: Follow live text, radio commentary and score updates as Czech Republic take on England in the UEFA U21 Championship.
articles.title: Euro U21 Championship: Czech Republic v England - live text and second half radio commentary

articles.description: Emma Raducanu overcomes Slovakia's Rebecca Sramkova to reach the quarter-finals at Queen's and will now regain her place as British number one for the first time in two years.
articles.title: Queen's 2025: Emma Raducanu reaches quarter-finals as new British number one

articles.description: England right-back Trent Alexander-Arnold describes joining Real Madrid as a "dream come true" and "huge responsibility" as he addressed the audience at his presentation on Thursday in Spanish.
articles.title: Trent Alexander-Arnold addresses audience in Spanish at Real Madrid presentation
